bill_title: Honoring the Tea Area boys track and field team.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring the Tea Area boys track and field team. WHEREAS, with several athletes finding success at the region track meet held on May 16 at the Tea Area High School, the boys claimed the first region title won by their track team since 2011. Several athletes were able to compete in the state meet due to their outstanding performances during the region meet; and WHEREAS, the Titan boys had two individual region champions with Braden Beach winning the long jump and Ean Minnaert winning the pole vault. Other team members were able to capture several event medals: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature shows its congratulations toward the Tea Area track and field team for their victory at the region track meet held in May. These athletes accomplished a feat many others have not achieved.
